item.description:
We'll have a blast on this quick get away to the cape!!

Board the high speed ferry to P-Town from Boston!!

We'll take the 9:00 am ferry on Boston Harbor Cruises - The Fast Ferry gets us there in an hour and a half....

http://www.bostonharborcruises.com/Directions.aspx

We'll bike from P-Town to one of the best hostel's - Truro (on the Nat'l Sea Shore -The distance is 12 miles) where we'll spend some time jumping the waves, just hanging out....or even bike some more!

This trip requires that you make your own individual reservation at the hostel for Saturday Night (they no longer accept group reservations).

Note: The hostel is filling up VERY quickly - so reserve today!!

http://capecod.hiusa.org/hitr/contact.php

We'll return Sunday on the 7:30 pm Ferry to arrive in Boston at 9pm.

Meals, ferry tickets, and hostel reservation is all booked by you.

e-mail me if you have any questions -

Rob Fox, Organizer/Founder
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the event is 617-894-8454
item.name: One Night in Truro! - Cape Cod
